item

Interface IItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TronObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChargedIdentityDisk, Flag, ForceFieldGenerator, IdentityDisk, Item, LightGrenade, Teleporter, UnchargedIdentityDisk

    public interface IItem
extends TronObject
    An Item is an object that can be placed on a NormalSquare. Each item has a unique ID. Some Items can be picked up by a TronPlayer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getId()
      Returns the unique ID of this item
      UseArguments<?> getUseArguments()
      Returns a UseArguments object for the user to add additional parameters requested by the item when executing the use method.
      boolean isCarriable()
      Return whether or not this item can be picked up by a TronPlayer.
      char toChar()
      Returns this object as a char.
      void use(SquareContainer square, UseArguments<?> arguments)
      Use the this item on a specified square with addition specified arguments.

      • Methods inherited from interface square.TronObject

        asAffectedByPowerFailure, asExplodable, asTeleportable

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        int getId()
        Returns the unique ID of this item
        Returns:
        The unique ID of this item

      • use

        void use(SquareContainer square,
       UseArguments<?> arguments)
        Use the this item on a specified square with addition specified arguments. The additional arguments can be retrieved by the getUseArguments() method. But these arguments need input from the user.
        Parameters:
        square - the square on which the item was used.
        arguments - The additional parameters an item needs
        Throws:
        IllegalUseException - When the item cannot be used on the specified square

      • isCarriable

        boolean isCarriable()
        Return whether or not this item can be picked up by a TronPlayer.
        Returns:
        whether or not this item can be picked up by a TronPlayer .

      • toChar

        char toChar()
        Returns this object as a char.
        Returns:
        A character representation of this object.

      • getUseArguments

        UseArguments<?> getUseArguments()
        Returns a UseArguments object for the user to add additional parameters requested by the item when executing the use method. If this item does not require additional parameters, null will be returned.
        Returns:
        a new useArguments that can be passed to the use(SquareContainer, UseArguments) method
